scripts.export-mongodb-collections: mongoexport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection accesses --out ./export/accesses.json; mongoexport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection admins --out ./export/admins.json; mongoexport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection clients --out ./export/clients.json; mongoexport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection sites --out ./export/sites.json
scripts.import-mongodb-collections: mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection accesses --drop --file ./export/accesses.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection admins --drop --file ./export/admins.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection clients --drop --file ./export/clients.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection sites --drop --file ./export/sites.json
